TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlEntity extends System.Xml.XmlNode

span.span: Represents an entity declaration, such as <!ENTITY... >.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string BaseURI { get; }
.property instance string BaseURI
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property BaseURI As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BaseURI { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前節點的基底統一資源識別項 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the base Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the current node.
The location from which the node was loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路的 XML 文件使用不同的全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 標準包含機制彙總的資料區塊組成，並因此包含來自不同位置的節點。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. `BaseURI`會告訴您這些節點的來源。The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from. 這個屬性的值視節點類型而異。The value of this property varies depending on the node type. 這是外部的 EntityReference 節點的子系節點傳回實體本身的位置。Nodes which are children of external EntityReference nodes return the location of the entity itself. 例如，請考慮下列的 XML 文件：For example, consider the following XML document: ```xml ]> &xyz; ``` 其中外部實體`a/b.xml`包含 XML 文字`123`。where the external entity `a/b.xml` contains the XML text `123`. 如果從已載入文件http://server/mydata.xml，`BaseURI`會傳回下列：If the document is loaded from http://server/mydata.xml, `BaseURI` returns the following: |NodeTypeNodeType|名稱Name|BaseURIBaseURI| |--------------|----------|-------------| |屬性Attribute|numnum|http://server/mydata.xml| |文件Document|#document#document|http://server/mydata.xml| |DocumentTypeDocumentType|項目item|http://server/mydata.xml| |實體Entity|xyzxyz|http://server/mydata.xml| |元素Element|項目item|http://server/mydata.xml| |EntityReferenceEntityReference|xyzxyz|http://server/mydata.xml| |元素Element|測試test|http://server/a/b.xml| |TextText|#text#text|http://server/a/b.xml| `BaseURI` 尋找實體參考界限，因此如果擴充實體，這項資訊不會保留，而且此屬性傳回的位置`XmlDocument`在所有情況下的物件。`BaseURI` looks for entity reference boundaries, so if entities are expanded, this information is not preserved and this property returns the location of the `XmlDocument` object in all cases. 在第二個範例中，指定下列的 XML 文件：As a second example, given the following XML document: ```xml &xyz; ``` 在文件類型定義 (DTD) 檔案包含下列內容：where the document type definition (DTD) file contains the following: ``` My Data"> ``` 如果 XML 文件載入從http://localhost/mydata.xml，`BaseURI`會傳回下列每個節點：If the XML document is loaded from http://localhost/mydata.xml, `BaseURI` returns the following for each of the nodes: |NodeTypeNodeType|名稱Name|BaseURIBaseURI| |--------------|----------|-------------| |文件Document|#document#document|http://localhost/mydata.xml| |DocumentTypeDocumentType|MydataMydata|http://localhost/doctype.dtd| |元素Element|baabaa|http://localhost/mydata.xml| |實體Entity|xyzxyz|http://localhost/doctype.dtd| |EntityReferenceEntityReference|xyzxyz|http://localhost/mydata.xml| |屬性Attribute|woofwoof|http://localhost/mydata.xml| > [!NOTE] > 預設屬性的基底 URI 等同於其所屬元素的基底 URI。The base URI of a default attribute is the same as the base URI of the element to which they belong. 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

param.name: deep
param.span: 若要在指定的節點下遞迴地複製子樹狀結構，則為 ；若只要複製節點本身，則為 。

span.span: to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; to clone only the node itself.
Creates a duplicate of this node.

summary.span: 無法複製 Entity 節點。

span.span: Entity nodes cannot be cloned.

summary.span: 在 物件上呼叫這個方法會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Calling this method on an object throws an exception.

returns.span: 傳回方法呼叫來源 的複本。

span.span: Gets the concatenated values of the entity node and all its children.

value.span: 節點的串連值和其所有的子節點。

span.span: The concatenated values of the node and all its children.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlEntity` 節點是唯讀的。`XmlEntity` nodes are read-only. 設定這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。Setting this property throws an exception. 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

span.span: Attempting to set the property.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the node is read-only.

value.span: 如果節點是唯讀，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the node is read-only; otherwise .

value.span: 因為 節點是唯讀，所以這個屬性必定傳回 。

span.span: Because nodes are read-only, this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法變更其屬性、 屬性或子系是唯讀的節點。A read-only node is one whose properties, attributes, or children cannot be changed. 您可以從樹狀目錄移除唯讀節點，然後插入該子其他地方。You can remove a read-only node from the tree and insert it somewhere else.
